event.school.title: First Day of School
event.school.desc: It's your first day at school! You see two groups of kids in the playground. One group is playing sports, the other has cool toys.
event.drama.title: Family Drama
event.drama.desc: You wake up to hear your parents arguing loudly in the kitchen. It sounds serious.
event.talent.title: Talent Discovered!
event.talent.desc: Your teacher is amazed by your work today. She says you have a natural gift!
event.goals.title: Life Goals
event.goals.desc: You start thinking about what you want to achieve in this life. A checklist forms in your mind...
goals.title: Life Checklist
skills.title: Skills
skills.noHobby: You haven't started a hobby yet. Pick one in Self Improvement!
skills.noBonus: Reach Level 30 in any skill to unlock bonuses.
event.birth.title: You are born
event.birth.desc: A new life begins. Your journey starts now.
event.childhood_park.title: Day at the Park
event.childhood_park.desc: Your parents take you to the park. The sun is shining!
event.childhood_kindergarten.title: First Day of Kindergarten
event.childhood_kindergarten.desc: It's your first day at kindergarten. You feel nervous but excited.
event.childhood_learning.title: Learning to Read
event.childhood_learning.desc: Your parents start teaching you to read.
event.childhood_pet.title: Want a Pet?
event.childhood_pet.desc: Your family is considering getting a pet.
event.childhood_school_start.title: Starting School
event.childhood_school_start.desc: It's your first day of school!
event.childhood_talent.title: Discover a Talent
event.childhood_talent.desc: Your teacher notices you have a special talent.
event.childhood_bully.title: School Bully
event.childhood_bully.desc: A bigger kid is picking on you.
event.childhood_birthday.title: Birthday Party
event.childhood_birthday.desc: It's your birthday! How do you celebrate?
event.childhood_sick.title: Feeling Sick
event.childhood_sick.desc: You caught a cold and don't feel well.
event.childhood_vacation.title: Family Vacation
event.childhood_vacation.desc: Your family is planning a vacation.
event.childhood_grades.title: Report Card
event.childhood_grades.desc: You got your grades. They could be better.
event.childhood_friend.title: Making Friends
event.childhood_friend.desc: Kids at school want to be your friend.
event.childhood_competition.title: School Competition
event.childhood_accident.title: Playground Accident
event.teen_puberty.title: Growing Up
event.teen_puberty.desc: Your body is changing. Puberty has arrived.
event.teen_hobby.title: Finding a Hobby
event.teen_hobby.desc: It's time to find something you love.
event.teen_first_crush.title: First Crush
event.teen_first_crush.desc: You have feelings for someone at school.
event.teen_bullying.title: Bullying
event.teen_bullying.desc: Someone is being mean to you.
event.teen_exam.title: Big Exam
event.teen_part_time.title: Part-Time Job
event.teen_part_time.desc: You can get a part-time job.
event.teen_popularity.title: Social Life
event.teen_popularity.desc: High school social dynamics are complicated.
event.teen_sports_team.title: Join the School Team
event.teen_sports_team.desc: The coach invites you to join the school sports team.
event.teen_sports_scholarship.title: Sports Scholarship
event.teen_sports_scholarship.desc: Your athletic performance caught attention. A school offers you a sports scholarship.
event.teen_prom.title: Prom Night
event.teen_driving.title: Driving License
event.teen_driving.desc: You can now get your driver's license.
event.teen_social_media.title: Social Media
event.teen_rebellion.title: Teenage Rebellion
event.teen_rebellion.desc: You feel like breaking the rules.
event.teen_graduation.title: High School Graduation
event.teen_graduation.desc: You made it through high school!
event.adulthood_start.title: Turning 18
event.adulthood_start.desc: You're officially an adult. What's next?
event.university_life.title: University Life

event.university_graduation.desc: You're about to graduate with a degree!
event.job_search.title: Looking for Work
event.relationship_meet.title: Someone Special
event.relationship_meet.desc: You meet someone who catches your eye.
event.relationship_propose.title: Ready for Marriage?
event.relationship_propose.desc: Your relationship is going well. Time to propose?
event.first_apartment.title: Moving Out
event.first_apartment.desc: It's time to get your own place.
event.move_city.title: Opportunity Abroad
event.move_city.desc: You have a chance to move to a new city.
event.career_promotion.title: Promotion!
event.career_promotion.desc: Your boss offers you a promotion.
event.first_investment.title: Investment Opportunity
event.first_investment.desc: You have some savings. Time to invest?
event.have_child.title: Start a Family?
event.have_child.desc: You and your partner discuss having a baby.
event.buy_car.title: Buy a Car?
event.buy_car.desc: You're thinking about getting a car.
event.buy_house.title: Buy a House?
event.buy_house.desc: You can afford to buy property.
event.midlife_reflection.title: Midlife Reflection
event.midlife_reflection.desc: You reflect on your life so far.
event.career_burnout.title: Burnout
event.marriage_anniversary.title: Wedding Anniversary
event.divorce.title: Marriage Troubles
event.health_checkup.title: Health Checkup
event.business_opportunity.title: Business Opportunity

event.child_graduation.title: Child Graduates
event.real_estate.title: Real Estate Investment
event.lottery.title: Lottery Ticket
event.inheritance.title: Inheritance
event.inheritance.desc: A relative has passed away and left you money.
event.lawsuit.title: Legal Trouble
event.retirement.title: Retirement
event.grandchild.title: Grandchild Born!
event.grandchild.desc: Your child has had a baby!
event.health_decline.title: Health Issues
event.health_decline.desc: Your health is declining with age.
event.wisdom.title: Wisdom of Age
event.wisdom.desc: You've gained so much wisdom over the years.
event.bucket_list.title: Bucket List
event.bucket_list.desc: Time to do things you've always wanted.
event.partner_death.title: Partner Passes Away
event.legacy.title: Your Legacy
event.legacy.desc: You think about what to leave behind.
event.car_accident.title: Car Accident
event.car_accident.desc: You were in a car accident.
event.natural_disaster.title: Natural Disaster
event.natural_disaster.desc: A disaster has struck your area.
event.viral_moment.title: Going Viral
event.viral_moment.desc: A video of you went viral!
event.jackpot.title: Jackpot!
event.robbery.title: Robbery
event.robbery.desc: Someone is trying to rob you!
event.stock_crash.title: Stock Market Crash
event.crypto_boom.title: Crypto Boom
event.stranger_help.title: Stranger Needs Help
event.stranger_help.desc: Someone on the street needs assistance.
event.reunion.title: Class Reunion
event.reunion.desc: Your school reunion is coming up.
event.world_travel.title: World Travel
event.world_travel.desc: You have a chance to travel the world.
event.city_local_moment.title: A moment in {city}
event.city_local_moment.desc: {flag} Life goes on in {city}, {country}. You notice the little things that make this place unique.
event.friend_opportunity.title: A friend's idea
event.friend_opportunity.desc: A close friend invites you to join a small opportunity. It might pay off — or waste time.
event.friend_betrayal.title: Friend betrayal
event.friend_betrayal.desc: A friend breaks your trust. The relationship changes.
event.friend_success.title: Friend's success
event.friend_success.desc: A friend has a big win and wants to celebrate.
event.family_emergency_illness.title: Family emergency
event.family_emergency_illness.desc: A parent is sick and needs support.
event.family_emergency_money.title: Family needs help
event.family_emergency_money.desc: Your family asks for financial help.
event.pet_health_issue.title: Pet health issue
event.remote_work_offer.title: Remote work offer
event.remote_work_offer.desc: A company offers you a remote freelance gig thanks to your laptop setup.
event.gym_progress.title: Gym progress
event.gym_progress.desc: Your gym routine is paying off. You feel stronger.
assets.title: Assets
summary.mistake.highStress: Let stress spiral out of control.
ui.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to restart? All unsaved progress will be lost.
onboarding.step1_desc: Your life begins now. Make choices to shape your destiny.
onboarding.step1_5_desc: Keep an eye on Health, Happiness, and Energy. Don't let them hit zero!
onboarding.step2_desc: You earned money and experience. Time moves forward.
onboarding.tap_here: Tap here to take your first action!
onboarding.next_year_tip: Now proceed to the next year!
event_lottery_win.desc: You checked your lottery ticket... and you won!
event_viral_video.desc: A video of you doing something silly went viral overnight.
event_inheritance.desc: A distant relative passed away and left you a small fortune.
event_chronic_illness.desc: You've been diagnosed with a chronic condition requiring expensive treatment.
event_scam_victim.desc: You fell for a convincing investment scam. Your savings are gone.
event_house_fire.desc: A fire broke out in your home! You made it out, but lost possessions.
event_lost_wallet.desc: You can't find your wallet anywhere.
event_found_pet.desc: A stray cat followed you home.
event_flat_tire.desc: You got a flat tire on the way to an important meeting.
event_rainy_day.desc: It's pouring rain and you forgot your umbrella.
event_book_club.desc: A friend invited you to a book club.
event_street_performer.desc: An amazing street performer is playing your favorite song.
ctrl_got_sick.title: You got sick
ctrl_got_sick.desc: You're feeling under the weather. What will you do?
iap.supportPack.title: Comfort Version
iap.supportPack.desc: Removes annoying ads and makes the game more comfortable. You can still watch ads voluntarily if you need help.
